events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but realized it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request to return the product for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order.
